txt.en:
'Ah! 'Tis good to see a face from the south in this harsh land. The locals are a fine enough sort but not the friendliest towards strangers, if you know what I mean. Perhaps you could see your way towards helping out a fellow countryman in need? You see, my fine young herald has gone missing! Several days ago the two of us were separated from our most excellent fellowship during a battle to the south. Afterwards, my herald and I came further north, hoping to re-group here in Sûri-kylä -- unfortunately, we stumbled upon a patrol of vile Angmarim on our way here!

'Well, though I fought valiantly, my herald somehow managed to lose his way in the confusion of battle -- you know how heralds are, no sense of direction whatsoever -- anyway, I am certain he managed to escape, but since then I have seen no sign of my faithful companion.

'I know this region poorly at best and would be most indebted to you if you could help me find my wayward herald. I cannot go off in search of the rest of my fellowship until I have him safely in tow again!'
'Thank goodness you are here! I was wondering if anyone would ever find me out here before I froze to death!\n\n'Did Reginald send you? He is not here with you, is he?'
'Have you found my herald yet? I'm quite concerned about the young fool!'

Reginald Ward has not only become separated from his Fellowship, but seems to have mislaid his herald as well. The two were separated during a battle against the Angmarim on the shelf at the edge of the Ice Bay, south-east of Sûri-kylä. Reginald is hoping that someone more familiar with the lands of Forochel can help him find his lost herald.

Reginald's herald was lost somewhere on the ice-shelf, south-east of Sûri-kylä, on the eastern edge of the Ice Bay of Forochel. Reginald Ward is at Sûri-kylä, north-west of the ice-shelf.\n\nReginald Ward asked you search for his herald and return him to Sûri-kylä.
